Videos are a great way to demonstrate all the good work we do. With help from the community team we'll produce some QA-related videos similar to <nowiki>[[MOTU/Videos|these MOTU videos]]</nowiki>.
== List of Videos ==

* http://videos.ubuntu.com/qavideos/ '''<- ???''' - Videos in .ogg format
* http://youtube.com/ubuntudevelopers - Youtube UbuntuDevelopers channel.

== How to submit them ==

* <nowiki>[[ScreencastTeam/RecordingScreencasts]]</nowiki> has a lot of useful information on how to record videos and how to convert them into various formats.
* Mail DanielHolbach the link of your video if you want to get your video added.
